modName: A Blacksmith in Winterhold - Hearthfire Compatibility
summary:
Requires Hearthfire. 

An additional compatibility mod for my mod A Blacksmith in Winterhold. 

Removes a stone quarry added by Hearthfire in the same place I put the door to Fenlok's Cave. See the images for details. 

This mod does not replace the main A Blacksmith in Winterhold mod.
descriptionHtml:
Requires Hearthfire. 

An additional compatibility mod for my mod A Blacksmith in Winterhold. 

Removes a stone quarry added by Hearthfire in the same place I put the door to Fenlok's Cave. See the images for details. 

This mod does not replace the main A Blacksmith in Winterhold mod.

Uploaded here because someone was having trouble downloading it from the Steam Workshop.
author: Phoenix316
